doc:
Sally Jane Bruce https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sally_Jane_Bruce 0 Sally Jane Bruce (born December 2, 1948, Los Angeles, California) is an American former child performer, best known for playing little Pearl Harper in Charles Laughton's 1955 film noir The Night of the Hunter. Sally_Jane_Bruce ( born December_2_,_1948 , Los_Angeles , California ) is an_American_former_child_performer , best_known for playing little_Pearl_Harper in Charles_Laughton 's_1955_film noir_The_Night of the_Hunter .
